name: Sound Not There // Sound Horn
description:
The game was developed at Nordic Game Jam 2017.

Controls

The game can be played with either keyboard & mouse or a controller.

  • WASD & mouse / analog sticks to move
  • Left click / "A" to hear an object's sound
  • Right click / "B" to hear the sound in your sound horn, or to swap sounds when facing an object close by.

Credits

Kristoffer Lind Holm - Programmer

Sigurd Knarhøi Johannsen - Technical Artist

Jonas Wagner - 2D Artist
